list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor and enhance data cleaning and embedding workflow
- Removed the simple cleaner method; unified all cleaning logic into a single advanced cleaning function. - Extended cleaning to all relevant textual columns, not just 'benefits' and 'company_profile_and_description'. - Modified character cleaning logic to replace special characters with spaces instead of removing them entirely, preserving token separation. - Separated salary-related features into their own dedicated DataFrame for modular feature handling. - Introduced a new, optional SpellChecker class—spell checking is no longer a required step within the Cleaner class. - Added PCA dimensionality reduction to the Embedding class to reduce embedding size and improve downstream efficiency.

task.summary:
Refactored 'Cleaner' class and model class; updated config file
- Improved structure of 'Cleaner' class for better maintainability. - Renamed the model class and the cleaner class for better readability and intuitiveness. - Updated the configuration file to include the path to the sentence transformer.

Refactored 'Cleaner' class and model class; updated config file
- Improved structure of 'Cleaner' class for better maintainability. - Renamed the model class and the cleaner class for better readability and intuitiveness. - Updated the configuration file to include the path to the sentence transformer.

Refactored configurations file; Made a main.py source file; Made a new class for the preliminary cleaning
- Split the configuration file into two files, helper.py and paths.py. These are just for readability purposes - Created main.py source file which will be responsible for running the whole pipeline including the preliminary cleaning - Created a PreliminaryCleaner.py class instead of using the procedural approach like before

Refactored main.py; Modified method implementation for 1. Cleaning and 2. Saving dataframes; Extracted a class from a procedural approach feature_engineering_simple.py
-Refactored: main.py is now training_pipeline.py This helps for training and inference abstraction -Modified: The cleaning methods in the Cleaner class are now more modular. This will make the inference pipeline faster -Modified: The method for saving dataframes now only takes the filename and the dataframe. The path is handled in the paths.py file. -Created: SalaryFeatureExtractor class is now used in place of the old procedural extraction of salary based features

Refactor and enhance data cleaning and embedding workflow
- Removed the simple cleaner method; unified all cleaning logic into a single advanced cleaning function. - Extended cleaning to all relevant textual columns, not just 'benefits' and 'company_profile_and_description'. - Modified character cleaning logic to replace special characters with spaces instead of removing them entirely, preserving token separation. - Separated salary-related features into their own dedicated DataFrame for modular feature handling. - Introduced a new, optional SpellChecker class—spell checking is no longer a required step within the Cleaner class. - Added PCA dimensionality reduction to the Embedding class to reduce embedding size and improve downstream efficiency.

Refactor and enhance data cleaning and embedding workflow
- Removed the simple cleaner method; unified all cleaning logic into a single advanced cleaning function. - Extended cleaning to all relevant textual columns, not just 'benefits' and 'company_profile_and_description'. - Modified character cleaning logic to replace special characters with spaces instead of removing them entirely, preserving token separation. - Separated salary-related features into their own dedicated DataFrame for modular feature handling. - Introduced a new, optional SpellChecker class—spell checking is no longer a required step within the Cleaner class. - Added PCA dimensionality reduction to the Embedding class to reduce embedding size and improve downstream efficiency.
